Title: Sliding Doors Asp:Button Adapter for SharePoint 2010
Description:
This project extends Sliding Doors Button Adapter project, with some improvements and compatibles with Microsoft SharePoint 2010.

Details:
- Overrides Asp:Button.Render() with <button /> instead of <input />
- Uses an custom .adapter in app_browser-folder
- Handles button:hover and button[disabled] (css)
- Compatible with: IE8+, FF, Chrome
- Deployed with SPJobDefinition

Thanks to:
- Sliding Doors Button Adapter project: http://slidingbuttons.codeplex.com/
- Wictor Wil√©n and his book: SharePoint 2010 Web Parts in Action
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project extends the Sliding Doors Button Adapter project with some improvements. It is now also compatible with Microsoft SharePoint 2010.

Details:
- Overrides Asp:Button.Render() with <button /> instead of <input />
- Uses an custom .adapter in app_browser-folder
- Handles button:hover and button[disabled] (css)
- Compatible with: IE8+, FF, Chrome
- Deployed with SPJobDefinition

Thanks to:
- Sliding Doors Button Adapter project
- Wictor Wilén and his book: SharePoint 2010 Web Parts in Action
